about: As a software manager and software architect with over 15 years of experience in the software industry, I have led development teams to create innovative and efficient solutions, improve user experience, and solve business challenges. As a software architect, I have built high-quality solutions that have generated excellent results for my clients and employers. I possess skills in project management, team leadership, and process improvement. I am committed to continuing to learn and grow in my career, and I am passionate about working in challenging and constantly changing environments.
